items.sentence: You\'re the one who told me that, aren\'t you?
You\'re the only person I\'d trust to do that.
You\'re too young to drive a car, aren\'t you?
You\'re too young to get married, aren\'t you?
I think that Tom made that mistake on purpose.
I appreciate your coming on such short notice.
Aren\'t you going to help us tomorrow morning?
Tom has evidently made up his mind to do that.
You shouldn\'t thank me. You should thank Tom.
Tom has been a close friend of mine for years.
How many times did you go swimming last month?
I thought Tom would be out partying with Mary.
I wonder whether or not Tom will go to Boston.
I can\'t remember the names of Tom\'s sisters.
Apparently, the brakes on the bus were faulty.
Tom is only a couple of years older than Mary.
Nobody can see this movie without being moved.
Did Tom really do that without anyone\'s help?
I don\'t know if I can go to the party or not.
Tom has an extremely expressive singing voice.
